department: Public Works and Government Services Canada
short_summary: Purchase of 1 Relay Battery for the Bell 429 Aircraft, to be delivered to Transport Canada, for use in the Air Services Directorate.
description: Purchase of 1 Relay Battery for the Bell 429 Aircraft, to be delivered to Transport Canada, for use in the Air Services Directorate.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
## Aircraft Part (Relay Battery) for Bell 429 Aircraft
### Solicitation Number: T8493-230015/A

**Published on:** June 29, 2023
**Tender Closes on:** July 10, 2023, at 2:00 PM Eastern Time
**Trade Agreement:** CETA/WTO-AGP/CPTPP/CFTA/FTAs with Peru/Colombia/Panama/Korea/UK

**Background:**
This is a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the purchase of a single item, Relay Battery, for the Bell 429 aircraft with serial number 57245 and tail number 443, for Transport Canada (TC), Air Services Directorate (ASD).

**Procurement Information:**
* Conversion of RFP: **Trade Agreement:** CETA / WTO-AGP / CPTPP / CFTA / FTAs avec le Pérou/Colombie/Panama/Corée/R-U
* **Provisioning Procedures:** Suppliers registered on the permanent list or able to meet qualification requirements.
* **Concurrence Procurement Strategy:** Best Overall Proposal

**Notification:**
The RFP will be sent directly to Qualified Suppliers by the contracting officer. The RFP documents will not be posted on the Government Electronics Tendering System (GETS).

**Submission Details:**
The proposed supplier must be one of the following:
Aero Precision Industries LLC, Aero Supplies Inc, Non-Destructive Testing Products Ltd, Bell Textron Canada (Contracts), Dart Aerospace, Maxcraft Avionics Ltd., MHD Rockland, Patlon Aircraft & Industries Ltd., Pole Air Aviation, Simex Defence Inc, Szabo Aviation, Textron Aviation, Tower Aerospace, Tulmar Safety, Unisource Technology Inc, Zepoli International Inc, PHP Canada, BSF International Inc, Helitrades Inc, Field Aviation, Alpine Aerotech, JHT Defense, Kadex Aero Supply, National Helicopters, Newcastle Aviation Partners LLC, Optima Aero, Southeast Aerospace, Canada West Avionics, Skyline Helicopter Technologies, Eagle Copters, Genaire LTD, Kitchener Aero (dba Mid-Canada Mod Center), Tronosjet Maintenance, Aero Technical Components, Arnprior Aerospace, Pratt & Whitney Canada, and Bristow Instruments (1977) Ltd.

**Required Information:**
Any inquiries related to this RFP must be directed to:
Valérie Bourassa, Supply Officer, Acquisitions
